meta.name: Hackathon 00 Onboarding Flow
meta.description: Multi-step registration and project creation flow for Buildstory's first community hackathon. Designed for progressive disclosure ‚Äî each input group reveals only after the previous group is completed (on blur/commit, not on first keystroke). The flow is a single-page experience with animated transitions between steps.

auth.method: Email + password only (no OAuth at signup)
auth.note: No display name or username is captured during Clerk signup. The onboarding flow collects identity info post-auth.

preview_badge.description: A live-updating user badge component rendered above the identity inputs. As the user fills in display name and username, the badge updates in real time. states.partial: Updates in real time as fields are filled ‚Äî e.g. display name appears as typed

interaction_patterns.progressive_disclosure: Sections within a step fade in only after the previous section's inputs are completed. 'Completed' means the user has committed to the field (on blur or selection), not on first keystroke. This prevents premature reveals while the user is still typing.
interaction_patterns.step_transitions: Animated fade + slide-up transition between steps.
interaction_patterns.optional_fields: Marked with an outline 'Optional' badge next to the label.
interaction_patterns.required_fields: Marked with an orange asterisk next to the label.
interaction_patterns.section_headers: Each input group has an icon, title, and description to provide context before the user interacts with the inputs.
